name: Verify if ashostMissing parameter is not present then missing parameter exception is thrown

statusDetails.message:
Expected: a string containing "Exception caused due to Missing/Invalid parameters"
     but: was "Exception caused due to network problems, connection breakdowns, gateway problems, inavailability of the remote SAP system, etc."
statusDetails.trace:
java.lang.AssertionError: 
Expected: a string containing "Exception caused due to Missing/Invalid parameters"
     but: was "Exception caused due to network problems, connection breakdowns, gateway problems, inavailability of the remote SAP system, etc."
	at org.hamcrest.MatcherAssert.assertThat(MatcherAssert.java:20)
	at org.junit.Assert.assertThat(Assert.java:956)
	at org.junit.Assert.assertThat(Assert.java:923)
	at sapadapter.stepDefinetions.StepDefDirectConnection.primaryMesaageIsValidatedWhenParameterIsMissing(StepDefDirectConnection.java:127)
	at ✽.Primary mesaage is validated with "missingInvalidParameterPrimaryMessage"(src\test\java\features\directConnection.feature:33)

Then  API call got the response with status code 503
